column1: |FUNCTION|CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION bookings.lang() RETURNS text LANGUAGE plpgsql AS $$\
bookings|now|timestamp with time zone|SQL|SELECT '2017-08-15 18:00:00'::TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Europe/Moscow'
